title: Wordscapist- The Myth by Arpan Panicker {dwg}
description:
Wordscapist (n): A legendary wordsmith, usually assumed to be male, who is rumoured to be able to shape reality to his words. Limitless in his powers, and not aligned with the Guild or the Free Word. No proof or evidence of his existence has ever been found. First known usage circa 16th century.

Everything you say is trueÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ somewhere. But for Slick the notion of what is true is becoming very blurred indeed. He always knew the world was one of constant change. Which is also happening rather too frequently for SlickÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s liking.

But thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s what happens when youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re thrown headlong into the world of wordsmiths, where simple words can shape and reshape reality, and the legend of the Wordscapist becomes more than just an urban myth. Slick must discover the Way of the Word if he is to shape a new reality and discover his true destinyÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Buckle up. Hang on. And yes, careful what you say. Everything you say is trueÃ¢â‚¬Â¦becomes trueÃ¢â‚¬Â¦somewhere.
